Module test_ui1
Package test_ui.Components

Class LiberalBoardController

java.lang.Object
test_ui.Components.Component.Component
test_ui.Components.LiberalBoardController
public class LiberalBoardController extends Component
Class LiberalBoardController is responsible for showing the liberal board surface and providing slotes for cards and the failing election count infornation Extends from Component
